afcf948efd991017787e390c61412ea1.title: New York Times defends hiring extreme climate denier: ‘millions agree with him’

4b1f38fb37da.bio: Dr. Joe Romm is Founding Editor of Climate Progress, “the indispensable blog,” as NY Times columnist Tom Friedman describes it.
4b1f38fb37da.name: Joe Romm

paragraphs.text: With that ‘logic’, the Times could hire as a columnist former Imperial Wizard of the Ku Klux Klan David Duke — or a flat earther or someone who thinks vaccines pose a health hazard. After all, millions agree with them.
